name: Bangle bracelets mixed metal
description: Set of 5 mixed metal bangle stacking bracelets. These are my favorite bracelets, I stack them with everything, sometimes fancy with vintage rhinestones others with friendship bracelets my sister and I make. Either way these metal bracelets are super versatile and fun to wear. Details: Handcrafted in my Portland studio from steel, silver and copper You'll receive all 5 bracelets pictured: one copper, one silver and three steel, each one has a unique texture and finish. The ones photographed are mine but yours will be just a well crafted. Please put measurements of your wrist and the size of your hand making a loose fist in the note to seller so I can ensure you receive the right size. For more fabulous bracelets to layer and stack visit here: Here

name: Hoop Feather Earrings, Colorful Spiked Feather Hoops
description: Hoop feather earrings are your perfect everyday feather earring! With a variety of colors to choose from you can have a different look every day of the week! These hoop feather earrings will quickly become your go to pair! Big on style but light as a feather the feather hoops are constructed from sterling silver so they are great for sensitive ears. Hoop feather earring detail: Hand dyed feathers in hot colors for every season Feather hoops measure 2" All metal is sterling silver To learn about how hoop feather earrings are made visit the Stonez N Stix blog here

name: Large Silver Hoop Earrings, Vintage Swarovski Crystal Hoops
description: Vintage Swarovski crystal and sterling silver hoop earrings are classy and stunning. The crystals are Aurora Borealis in color and display sparkling prisms of light in a rainbow of colors for those moments when you want to catch someones eye. Hoops are big 4" Swarovski crystal is 12mm All metal is sterling silver More luscious treats for your ears here: Here

name: Sari Silk Wrap Bracelet, Silver and Black
description: Classy and edgy! Sari silk five wrap bracelet in black and silver . Wear with jeans and a tee or glam it up with leather and heels for a night on the town. About the materials: Sari silk is collected by woman in India from the Sari mills the sales from the silk help to provide wages for two families. African trade beads are handmade beads typically made between the 15th and 20th century. These African beads were originally used as a currency for goods and services. While most of these are imported directly from Africa some were made throughout Europe, and used for trade in Africa, hence the term "African trade beads." Faceted Hematite sparkles in this bracelet! Hematite is used for love, protection and healing. If you need your personal relationship to be better, carry a hematite with you always. Details: Bracelet measures 33" The looped end is made to wrap around the button several times allowing it to fit most wrists, on smaller wrists it will wrap up to 5 times, larger ones 2 - 3. There is 15" of extra fabric, fun to tie in a bow or wrap around and tuck in for extra layers. Check them all out: Here

name: Turquoise, Sterling Silver Dangle Earrings
description: These long dangling earrings are so sweet you'll never want to take them off. Turquoise from the Zuni region plays with Hematite, faceted metal beads and porcupine quills. Lux with just the right amount of tough. Total length: a little under 6" All metal is sterling and fine silver Two large turquoise beads are natural and untreated smaller beads have been heat treated for stability Visit the complete collection of Stonez N Stix jewelry Here
